div.head: 小便遺失
div.div: minor relief with loss [of urine]; involuntary loss of urine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief with loss [of urine]; involuntary loss of urine

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with yi niao 遺尿 . Dan xi shou jing Book on clinical medicine. Early 丹溪手鏡 Ming era. Mj: 小便遺失者肺虛也 , “ Involuntary loss of urine is [associated with] lung depletion”.
